messages.title: A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.
Help Pauline Pearce deliver even more
messages.content: Pauline and the Lib Dems have a strong record of action in Hackney. She has helped deliver thousands of new affordable homes, bring in millions in extra funding for local schools and cut crime with extra police on the local beat. Now she wants to do even more on housing, jobs, and cleaner air.

messages.title: 3 great reasons to vote for Pauline Pearce
messages.content: A vote for Pauline is a vote to: 1. Protect vital local services, like local A&Es. 2. Oppose plans to build on Hackney’s vital green spaces. 3. Campaign to improve local transport links.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Creating jobs and cutting taxes for local people.
Delivering millions in extra funding for all local schools.
Pauline has helped deliver thousands of new affordable homes.
Cut crime with extra police on the beat.

mentions.tacticalSituation: How you could shift the balance. Tactical voting could help make Pauline Pearce your Lib Dem MP.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am also standing as a London European Election candidate for the Liberal Democrats.

quotes.text: Pauline Pearce fights for what she believes in... she’s formidable.

images.caption: Pauline Pearce, Liberal Democrat candidate for Hackney North and Stoke Newington
